title: Stream: Clock Opera – Ways To Forget
body:
One of the most highly anticipated debut albums of 2012, **Clock Opera’s _Ways To Forget_** is a sterling lesson in crafting vibrant, anthemic pop songs.

From the festival-ready opener _Once And For All_, through to the tinkling closer _Fail Better_, it’s a record that is destined to propel them to far greater heights. Ahead of the albums release next Monday (23 April), the London four piece have made _**Ways To Forget**_ available to hear in it’s entirety. Stream the record below and check out their tour dates after the jump.

*   Apr 17 Sheffield
*   Apr 18 Birmingham

Via [Hypem](http://hypem.com/artist/Clock%20Opera)
